name: Hacking Simulator
summary:
Prove your knowledge in web technology, programming and hacking.

There are a certain number of levels. You start at level 1. To reach the next level, a puzzle is given on the level 1 page. This can be hidden clues in the source code of the web page, some header information, a pixel on the web page, an image what is coded with text, etc... the possibilities are endless.
